page.title: 12SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY - Bush house and estate can be traced back over 200 years.In 1948 it was taken over for agricultural research.Bush house is the main administrative building surrounded by some of the research departments of the Edinburgh Centre for rural economy including the hill farming research organisation , Edinburgh computer centre,Edinburgh school of agriculture,Institute of occupational medicine,Tropical vetinery investigation centre and Scottish institute of agricultural engineering. RESEARCH STATIONS - Poultry Research centre,Roslin started in 1971,main building added in 1980.There are four depts. feeding:breeding:behaviour and genetics,all on a 35 acre site.Help in poultry research is given to the Third
